name: Ropedive
description:
pssst, go full screen

...

Somewhere deeeeep (some say even deeeper)

in these treacherous caves

an emerald of ultimate power is hidden

...

Many have tried and failed

in their searches of this mighty source.

It’s time for the creature with the rope to finally reach it.

...

Move - UP/DOWN keys

Jump - SPACE

Dash (switch wall, kill enemy) - LEFT/RIGHT + SPACE
